# Workplace interaction Import some plotting libraries and set some defaults: ::: {#cell-2 .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} %config InlineBackend.figure_formats = ['svg'] from IPython.display import display, Markdown import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns sns.set() sns.set_style("whitegrid") import random import numpy as np import pandas as pd random_seed = 5 ``` ::: ::: {#cell-3 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} danish_people = ['Julie', 'Sofie', 'Sara', 'Cecilie', 'Emma', 'Caroline', 'Laura', 'Mathilde', 'Katrine', 'Anna', 'Emilie', 'Ida', 'Freja', 'Maria', 'Amalie', 'Camilla', 'Louise', 'Signe', 'Maja', 'Josefine', 'Line', 'Nanna', 'Anne', 'Nicoline', 'Clara', 'Victoria', 'Marie', 'Natasja', 'Lærke', 'Alberte', 'Frederikke', 'Rebecca', 'Mette', 'Rikke', 'Amanda', 'Mia', 'Kristine', 'Johanne', 'Stine', 'Simone', 'Isabella', 'Jasmin', 'Michelle', 'Pernille', 'Christina', 'Astrid', 'Sille', 'Thea', 'Mie', 'Nadia', 'Mathias','Mads','Mikkel','Rasmus','Emil','Oliver','Frederik','Christian','Nicolai','Jonas','Jacob','Kasper','Magnus','Andreas','Tobias','Simon','Lucas','Marcus', 'Victor', 'Nicklas', 'Sebastian', 'Daniel', 'Alexander', 'Anders', 'Christoffer', 'Patrick', 'Lasse', 'Benjamin', 'Thomas', 'Martin', 'Jeppe', 'Gustav', 'Peter', 'Philip', 'William', 'Oscar', 'Malthe', 'Jonathan', 'Anton', 'Morten', 'Carl', 'Søren', 'Mohammad', 'Mark', 'Jens', 'Jesper', 'David', 'Asger', 'Michael', 'Johan'] nr_danes = len(danish_people) ``` ::: ## Sampling ::: {#cell-doc-sampling .cell execution_count=3} ::: {#doc-sampling .cell-output .cell-output-display .cell-output-markdown execution_count=3} I sampled 100 danaes from workplaces in Denmark. More about the sampling... blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, ::: ::: ::: {#cell-doc-interviews .cell execution_count=4} ::: {#doc-interviews .cell-output .cell-output-display .cell-output-markdown execution_count=4} Workplace individuals were interviewed by .... blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, blah, ::: ::: ::: {#cell-7 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} df = pd.DataFrame({'name': danish_people, 'seniority': np.random.randint(0, 5, len(danish_people)), 'age': np.random.randint(22, 67, len(danish_people))}) df['informality'] = np.random.normal(loc=10, scale=1, size=len(danish_people)) df ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5} ```{=html}
name seniority age informality
0 Julie 4 58 9.944085
1 Sofie 3 42 9.600922
2 Sara 0 55 8.107589
3 Cecilie 2 39 10.745701
4 Emma 0 52 10.304008
... ... ... ... ...
95 Jesper 0 66 8.729660
96 David 2 31 10.554446
97 Asger 3 64 10.223756
98 Michael 1 24 11.298557
99 Johan 0 53 10.708786

100 rows × 4 columns

``` ::: ::: ::: {#cell-fig-danish-interaction .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.scatterplot(x='age', y='informality', data=df, hue='seniority', palette='viridis') plt.ylabel('How informal you can be') plt.xlabel('Age') plt.legend(title='Seniority', loc='lower right', labels=['Undergrad', 'Postgrad', 'PhD', 'Postdoc', 'Professor']) plt.ylim(bottom=0) ; ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![Interaction among Danes: How Danes interact is has very little to do with age and seniority, compared to most other contries.](02_interaction_files/figure-html/fig-danish-interaction-output-1.svg){#fig-danish-interaction} ::: ::: Seems Danish people act very informally unaffected by age and seniority. ::: {#cell-11 .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} informality_age_cor = df.informality.corr(df.age) informality_age_cor ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7} ``` -0.13078736692763468 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#cell-12 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} informality_seniority_cor = df.informality.corr(df.seniority) informality_seniority_cor ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8} ``` 0.02930324759614983 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#cell-doc-formality-correlation .cell execution_count=9} ::: {#doc-formality-correlation .cell-output .cell-output-display .cell-output-markdown execution_count=9} The correlation between informality and age was -0.131 and the correlation between informality and seniority was 0.029. ::: ::: ::: {#cell-fig-danish-interaction-regressions .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} sns.lmplot(x='age', y='informality', data=df, hue='seniority', palette='viridis') plt.ylabel('How informal you can be') plt.xlabel('Age') ; ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![Interaction among Danes: Regressions of informality against age for five levels of seniority.](02_interaction_files/figure-html/fig-danish-interaction-regressions-output-1.svg){#fig-danish-interaction-regressions} ::: :::
